Detailed Description

functions to control clock and timers

Author:
Dario Carluccio <hr20-at-carluccio-dot-de>
Date:
01.02.2008
Rev
112

Function Documentation

ISR ( TIMER2_OVF_vect   ) 

timer/counter2 overflow interrupt routine

Note:
  • add one second to internal clock
  • increment tick counter

Here is the call graph for this function:

void RTC_AddOneDay ( void   ) 

Add one day to date variables

Note:
calculate overflows, regarding leapyear, etc.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void RTC_AddOneSecond ( void   ) 

Add one second to clock variables

Note:
  • calculate overflows, regarding leapyear, etc.
  • process daylight saving
    • last sunday in march 1:59:59 -> 3:00:00
    • last sunday in october 2:59:59 -> 2:00:00
      ONLY ONE TIME -> set FLAG RTC_DS
      reset FLAG RTC_DS on November 1st

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

int8_t RTC_DaysOfMonth (  ) 

Returns:
number of days for actual month (1-12) and year (0-255: 2000-2255)

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

uint8_t RTC_DowTimerGet ( rtc_dow_t  dow,
uint8_t  slot 
)

get timer for one timerslot for one weekday

Parameters:
dow day of week
slot timeslot number
Returns:
switching time of dow-timer
Note:
  • maximum timers for each weekday with RTC_TIMERS_PER_DOW
  • only 10 minute intervals supported:
    hh:m0 is coded in one byte: hh*10 + m
    e.g.: 12:00 = 120, 17:30 = 173, 22:10 = 221
  • deactivates timer returns 0xff

uint8_t RTC_DowTimerGetActualIndex ( void   ) 

get actual timer index

Returns:
timerslot index
Note:
what is the last occured timer index needed to calculate the actual valid timer index

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

uint8_t RTC_DowTimerGetStartOfDay ( void   ) 

get timer index for previous day

Returns:
timerslot index
Note:
what was status at 00:00 of the actual day needed to calculate the actual valid timer index

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void RTC_DowTimerSet ( rtc_dow_t  dow,
uint8_t  slot,
uint8_t  time 
)

set timer for one timerslot for one weekday

Parameters:
dow day of week
slot timeslot number
time time
Note:
  • maximum timers for each weekday with RTC_TIMERS_PER_DOW
  • only 10 minute intervals supported:
    hh:m0 is coded in one byte: hh*10 + m
    e.g.: 12:00 = 120, 17:30 = 173, 22:10 = 221
  • to deactivate timer: set value 0xff

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void RTC_Init ( rtc_callback_t  pFunc  ) 

Init RTC

Note:
  • Start Timer/Counter2 in asynchronous operation using a 32.768kHz crystal
  • Set Date after Reset
  • set RTC_Ticks = 0
Parameters:
pFunc pointer to callback function for DOW timer
